metadata.title: CVE-2018-14339 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 2.6.0 to 2.6.1, 2.4.0 to 2.4.7, and 2.2.0 to 2.2.15, the MMSEdissector could go into an infinite loop. This was addressed inepan/proto.c by adding offset and length validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14339` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1').
